channel.title: Nina Leonard
channel.desc: A collection of beautifully designed and elegant knitwear dresses, skirts and sweaters with co-ordinated accessories.

channel.title: Y.A.S Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in and discover Y.A.S, a contemporary fashion brand who create for those who love fashion and freedom of expression. Enhance your wardrobe with their beautifully crafted designs.

channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: UK Lash
channel.desc: Achieve dramatic eyes you can't wait to show off with UK Lash. With all the sassy products you need in your make-up bag, this show is for beauties like you.

channel.title: Everyday Footwear
channel.desc: Relax in style and comfort with our great range of everyday shoes, including comfy flats, supportive trainers and chic sandals. Tune in now for an hour of casual footwear perfect for your new routine.

channel.title: Cook's Essentials Sale
channel.desc: Designed specifically in response to QVC customers' feedback, this exclusive brand offers a wide range of cookware at truly outstanding value.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.title: Radley London
channel.desc: Radley fashion accessories provide an aspirational mix of style, attention to detail and desirability, offering designs for every occasion that make you look and feel fabulous.

channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.
